item.title: University of Aberdeen’s research project to tackle land loss in Ethiopia, utilises iSDAsoil
item.description: David McBey and Michael Martin from the University of Aberdeen speak to iSDA about how they are using the iSDAsoil resource to underpin the tools developed for their project. The project – Reducing land degradation and carbon loss from Ethiopia’s soils to strengthen livelihoods and resilience – is funded through a £1,000,000 grant from the UKRI Global Challenges Research Fund (GCRF). David McBey describes the project aims and background My background is that I’m a social scientist.
